case.title: Seeking arrangement with a pretty 18-25yo Girl
case.text: So it's straightforward enough, no point beating about the bush, I'm simply looking for a little fun. If you need cash, there are far worse ways of earning Â£100 than spending an hour with a guy doing something that you might just enjoy anyway. I'm a decent, professional guy who just doesn't have the time to go through all the rigmarole of trying to find somebody the usual way so I'm giving this a go to see what happens.
